amendment.description: Amendment provides $10 million to fund the second year of the VA-US Paralympics Adaptive Sports Program for disabled veterans.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 111-570 to provide $10 million to fund the second year of the VA-US Paralympics Adaptive Sports Program for disabled veterans.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Buyer amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Buyer.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Buyer amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
